trans-unit.source: Stores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 儲存 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection> class is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage> to provide a list of the input languages installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection>類別會由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage>提供安裝在系統上的輸入語言的清單。

trans-unit.source: You cannot directly create an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 您無法直接建立此類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> 是否含有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> is contained in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> 包含在集合裡，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the values copied from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> 複製之值的目的地的一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index in <c>array</c> where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中的索引，複製作業從此處開始。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> values to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> 值複製到指定索引處的一維 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> specifies a multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" />，指定多維陣列。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> is greater than the available space between the <paramref name="index" /> and the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> 中的項目數大於 <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="array" /> 結尾之間的可用空間。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 <paramref name="array" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> 的索引，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the entry to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中以零為基底的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the entry at the specified index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> 之指定索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> at the specified index of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" />，位於集合中的指定索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the valid range of indexes for the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 超出集合索引的有效範圍。
